title: Updated YT Jeffsey all-mountain bikes introduce new Core lineup, Uncaged limited editions
content:
YT have announced the retirement of the old Pro Race, Race, Comp and Base model classification, replacing it with the Core line-up. The YT Jeffsy is the first of the YT mountain bikes to enter the new classification system, which will number models from 2-4, with Core 4 dripping in the highest value spec of […]

The post Updated YT Jeffsey all-mountain bikes introduce new Core lineup, Uncaged limited editions appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
